objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver with Rose Gold
• Elegant Pink Drop Wreath Design
• Certificate of Authenticity
• 6-Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

- Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 71 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a feminine and elegant layout perfect for showcasing jewelry. It uses a soft, quadrant-style background with alternating shades of blush pink to subtly divide the canvas into sections. The top left quadrant highlights a bold brand name (text ID: "heading") and a modern subheading (text ID: "subheading"), both in deep rose tones. The top right quadrant is visually anchored by a centrally placed product image (ID: "product_image") of rose gold earrings. The bottom left quadrant includes a detailed product description (text ID: "description") in a complementary muted brown, a visually striking price tag (ID: "price"), and a prominent dark rose-colored call-to-action button (IDs: "cta_button" and "cta"). Fine decorative elements like circles and curves add minimal yet stylish embellishment to the background.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Blush: `#FFF5F5`
- Pale Pink: `#FFE6E6`
- Soft Rose: `#F9D5D3`
- Deep Rose: `#D35D6E`
- Warm Maroon: `#8B4C5C`
- Accent Pink (Decorative): `#F08080`
- White (Button Text): `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of intricately designed earrings that combine a soft rose gold base with dazzling white gemstones. The primary color is a gentle **Rose Gold (#F7B3A7)**, used intricately on the metal frame and floral petal accents, creating a warm and elegant appearance. Brilliant **Diamond White (#FFFFFF)** stones are embedded throughout, amplifying the design’s sparkle and bringing contrast to the warm tones. Secondary accents of **Crystal Silver (#E1E1E1)** appear within the faceted gems, enhancing depth and shine. The harmonious blending of the pink and silver tones creates a luxurious and feminine aesthetic ideal for premium advertisement banners.
